updateProfile.anyPayments:
Any payments received by Visa or Mastercard will automatically be converted to the USDC on Polygon.
 Please note that all fiat payments via Visa and Mastercard on this platform are processed by Wert.

partnership.title: Become a Payo partner
partnership.textBody: In the near future, we launch a partnership program. You will be able to refer businesses to accept cryptocurrency payments through PAYO and reduce your commission percentage from 1% to 0% forever.
